pages.title: Configuration
pages.text: Can be disabled in the configuration file.

pages.title: Black Chocobo
pages.text: Black Chocobos have a chance of producing one of the following on an entity kill.$(br)- $(item)Wither Rose$() $(br)- $(item)Dead Bush$()

pages.title: Flame Chocobo
pages.text: Flame Chocobos have a chance of producing one of the following on an entity kill.$(br)- $(item)Magma Cream$()$(br)- $(item)Crimson Fungus$()$(br)- $(item)Warped Fungus$()

pages.title: Green Chocobo
pages.text: Green Chocobos have a chance of producing one of the following on an entity kill.$(br)- $(item)Moss Block$()$(br)- $(item)Spore Blossom$()$(br)- $(item)Small Drip leaf$()

pages.title: White Chocobo
pages.text: White Chocobos have a chance of producing one of the following on an entity kill.$(br)- $(item)Bone Meal$()$(br)- $(item)Snowball$()$(br)- $(item)Lily of The Valley$()$(br)- $(item)Oxeye Daisy$()

pages.title: Gold Chocobo
pages.text: Gold Chocobos have a chance of producing one of the following on an entity kill.$(br)- $(item)Gold Nugget$()$(br)- $(item)Sunflower$()

pages.title: Blue Chocobo
pages.text: Blue Chocobos have a chance of producing one of the following on an entity kill.$(br)- $(item)Nautilus Shell$()$(br)- $(item)Kelp$()$(br)- $(item)Sea Pickle$()

pages.title: Pink Chocobo
pages.text: Pink Chocobos have a chance of producing one of the following on an entity kill.$(br)- $(item)Allium$()$(br)- $(item)Brown Mushroom$()$(br)- $(item)Red Mushroom$()

pages.title: Red Chocobo
pages.text: Red Chocobos have a chance of producing one of the following on an entity kill.$(br)- $(item)Bamboo$()$(br)- $(item)Stick$()$(br)- $(item)Vine$()

pages.title: Purple Chocobo
pages.text: Purple Chocobos have a chance of producing one of the following on an entity kill.$(br)- $(item)Ender Pearl$()$(br)- $(item)Chorus Flower$()

pages.title: Yellow Chocobo
pages.text: Yellow Chocobos have a chance of producing one of the following on an entity kill.$(br)- $(item)Dandelion$() - $(item)Poppy$()$(br)- $(item)Blue Orchid$() - $(item)Allium$()$(br)- $(item)Azure Bluet$() - $(item)Red Tulip$()$(br)- $(item)Orange Tulip$() - $(item)White Tulip$()$(br)- $(item)Pink Tulip$() - $(item)Oxeye Daisy$()$(br)- $(item)CornFlower$() - $(item)Lily of the Valley$()
